search_results.title: Little Brother — Journalist and Fentanyl Crisis Speaker
search_results.snippet: Little Brother tells the story of journalist Ben Westhoff's relationship with Jorell Cleveland through the Big Brothers Big Sisters program.

search_results.title: Little Brother (Doctorow novel)
search_results.snippet: Little Brother is a novel by Cory Doctorow, published by Tor Books. It was released on April 29, 2008. The novel is about four teenagers in San Francisco ...

search_results.title: About Little Brother | Cory Doctorow's craphound.com
search_results.snippet: About Little Brother ... Marcus, a.k.a “w1n5t0n”, is only seventeen years old, but he figures he already knows how the system works–and how to work the system.
